EmailTemplate.name: T&M Field PDF Email
EmailTemplate.subject: {!TM__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer,
Thank you for your signature. Attached is the fully executed T&M describing services performed by {!TM__c.Display_Company_Name__c} on {!TM__c.Scheduled_Date__c}.
Regards,
{!TM__c.Display_Company_Name__c}
